education.description: Activities and Societies: Cloud End-to-End Business Process Integration Testing Duration: Feb 2022 - Jun 2022 (4 months) I undertook SAP's "Cloud End-to-End Business Process Integration Testing" at BITS Pilani. The project focused on ensuring high availability, no downtime, and regression-free delivery of SAP's Business Technology Platform (BTP) and its various services.           BEA organized Bihar Entrepreneurship Summit on 21st March where entrepreneurs from all over India and abroad joined. They also organized BIZ Plan Competition. The entrepreneurs discussed all the ups and downs while building an enterprise. They held a panel discussion in which the audience could directly ask their queries and get answered. The event was lively broadcasted. The event was a great success and brought new and enthusiastic entrepreneurs and linked them each other solving each others need and thus building an awful enterprise.
